2019 Corporate Social Responsibility Report 3
Our customers include advocacy-based nonprofits, social welfare 
organizations, national and local labor unions, political organizations, 
foundations and sustainability-focused, socially responsible  
businesses, as well as the members and stakeholders of these 
commercial customers.
OUR MISSION
Our mission is to be America’s socially responsible bank empowering 
organizations and individuals to advance positive social change.
OUR VALUES
THE COMPANY WE KEEP
We take pride in supporting organizations and affiliations who 
share in our mission to advance social change.
AMALGAMATED IS THE COUNTRY’S LARGEST 
B CORP ® CERTIFIED BANK
We have been a certified B Corp® since January 2017. 
B Corp® certification is the only one of its kind, comprehensively 
measuring a company’s social and environmental performance, 
transparency and accountability. In 2019, our  
B Impact Score rose from 87 to 115 (the minimum 
score for certification is 80), further underscoring our 
commitment to reducing inequality, lowering levels 
of poverty, creating a healthier environment, building 
strong communities and creating more high-quality 
jobs that promote dignity and purpose.• Inclusion
